reviews.review: mt bom jogo, fiquei com dor de cabeça jogando
Awesome puzzle game, funny, easy, difficult, bunch of achievments and lots of fun! (i´m not a bot i REALLY like this game)
very fun and smart and really makes you really think what you will do
At first I had mixed opinions for this game being short, but the end changed that.

Uno de los juegos más innovadores de todos los tiempos; único en su tipo. El hecho de jugar con la singularidad espacial lo hace sumamente divertido. La dificultad va incrementando conforme uno avanza y el contenido extra vale la pena completarlo. La trama es sumamente disparatada e hilarante.

Recomendado a más no poder.
I used the portals to fly.

best game ever , funny storyline, just the best

Sebbene sia ormai un gioco che si potrebbe considerare 'vecchio', è comunque magnifico, e per chi gioca solo il secondo capitolo posso dire che si perde davvero un buon pezzo di questo franchise.
Alla fine si tratta della prima introduzione al concetto dei portali ed è l'origine della storia, la quale è sicuramente ai livelli del secondo capitolo.
Vale assolutamente il prezzo.
Shoot portal and shoot another portal, jump into portal and out the other. Can also bhop. Fun puzzle game, cool story, and much more. Definitely would recommend.

2007년에 출시된 게임이지만 2021년 현재까지도 충분히 세련된 분위기를 자랑하는 게임. 초등학생 시절 친구가 이 게임을 하는 걸 보면서도, 어차피 개인 컴퓨터도 돈도 없던 나는 저건 신 포도일 거야 하고 넘겼지만, 공교롭게도 그렇게 포탈에서 관심을 껐기에 성인이 되어 내 돈으로 컴퓨터를 구매하고 포탈을 플레이했을 때 더 재미있게 즐길 수 있었다. 엔딩곡 Still Alive 역시 14년이 지난 지금까지도 세련된 명곡이었기에 포탈은 확실히 걸작이다.
Good, intuitive puzzle game, absolute classic, somewhat creepy in some parts, this is a great game.
Truly amazing story and engaging puzzles. There are some issues with freezing I would recommend just tinkering with the settings for. Other than that this is truly a masterpiece!

Pro's:
-the levels with the turrets are fun (for me)
-good story line
Cons:
-a but short

Portal pone a prueba tu ingenio con buenos puzzles y una jugabilidad más que divertida. Su mundo es gris y desolado, pero lo mezcla con un muy buen humor que hace a la experiencia agradable y a la vez misteriosa. No tengo nada mas que agregar, me toca seguir por su segunda parte.
BUEN JUEGO SU PUZZLES ME EXPLOTAN EL CEREBRO ESO ES LO DIVERTIDO QUE SEA DIFICIL
Eines der besten Spiele die ich je gespielt habe. Das Konzept ist genial, ebenso die Story. Ich kann es nur empfehlen ;D
la jugabilidad es lo que hizo grande este juego, la historia es muy buena, mas cuando matas a ese robot hijo de puta, 8/10 es mas corto que tu pija
игра прикольная, но мало сюжета.  Во второй части его намного больше. Также голос у ГЛэДОС многим режет уши, но мне норм. Для тех, кому нужен сюжет игра не пойдет.
more like FARTOL LOL naw but seriously you play as a girl in this game which is pretty wacky.

I recently got this game due to the fact since I'm new to PC gaming and though the game play of portal would be a good way start due to it's simple to learn mechanics. Come to found out that it's a game while simple to understand, comes with interesting puzzles and mechanics, and yet despite being difficult, I didn't feel the need to look up a walk through. I would recommend this for anyone who enjoys the puzzle genre, though due this gamed infamy I believe most people already know how good this game is.

great game, really interesting and fun

A fun, short, humorous game with a innovative and effective mechanic of portals. While this game is over a decade old and anyone who's familiar with Valve's work will know the praises of this game, I still feel compelled to write a positive review. Took me a little less than 9 hours to 100% the game but it's well worth the money time as a cult classic. 10/10 Definitely a buy

Gostei muito do jogo e da história. É fixe e alternativo

Insanely creative gameplay, witty writing, and (in the best way possible) addicting gameplay. Strong 9/10 to a soft 10/10. Will make you feel smarter as you progress. I wish more games were as god damn amazing.
Great game, as good today as it was when it was released.
This is the best game ever!! (My opinion)

Corto e intenso. Ya había jugado al "Portal 2" hace años y pensaba que en comparación la primera entrega podría resultar trivial. Sin embargo, todos sus niveles son interesantes y consiguen meterte en la atmósfera de pesadilla tan característica que tiene este juego. Sin duda es una leyenda, y sigue sorprendiendo a día de hoy como juego de puzzles. Recomendado jugar acompañado.
